smote_likes Description¶

smote_likes.distance_metrics Package¶

Functions¶

hvdm(X, y[, ind_cat_cols])

Computes HVDM distance metric with normalized_vdm_2 for categorical data and normalized_diff for numeric.

dvdm(X, y[, ind_cat_cols, use_s])

Computes DVDM distance metric with normalized_vdm2 for all data after discretizing continuous data.

ivdm(X, y[, ind_cat_cols, use_s])

Computes IVDM distance metric with normalized_vdm_2 for categorical data and interpolated_vdm for numeric.

discretize_columns(X, s)

Transform a matrix of continuous into discrete features.

normalized_diff(X)

Computes Normalised Difference Metric between continuous features

normalized_vdm_2(X, y)

Computes Normalised Value Difference Metric 2

nvdm2(X, Y, cond_proba_list[, idist])

Calculate the nvdm2 between two observations \(\sum_{c=1}^{C} \left | P_{x,c} - P_{y,c} \right |^2\) for c classes accross all attributes.

get_cond_probas(X, y)

Get a list of all conditional probabilities in each column of X

interpolated_vdm(X, y, s)

Computes Interpolated Value Difference Metric

WM97

D. R. Wilson and T. R. Martinez. Improved heterogeneous distance functions. Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research, 6:1–34, jan 1997. doi:10.1613/jair.346.
